item.title: Tick marks, variable names, and ggplot2
item.description: I still remember how hard it was to learn ggplot2 after only knowing a little about R1. Sure, the plots seemed pretty. But compared to the ways I had used R before, ggplot2’s syntax seemed almost counter-intuitive. Its pipe-like + workflow of building layer-by-layer was like nothing I had ever used before. Not to mention, I was unfamiliar with central terms of art like “geoms” and “aesthetics”. But then again…the plots were really pretty.
